alert.note: Alert for Grant; Jefferson; Lonoke; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 8:55AM CDT until July 21 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Northern Grant County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Saline County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 945 AM CDT. * At 855 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Little Rock to Southwest Little Rock to near Bryant to near Benton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Benton... West Little Rock... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... Southwest Little Rock... Haskell... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Argenta... Redfield... Traskwood... Tull... Otter Creek... Cane Creek... Ironton... Estes... Toltec Mounds State Park... East End... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Little Rock. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
